import React from 'react' import "./CreateEvent.scss" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' let APIUrl = "http://localhost:8080/events" class CreateEvent extends React.Component { state = { id: "", event: "", date: "", img: "", organizer: "", description: "", tags: [], } //event for the cancel button cancelOnClick = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); this.props.history.push('/') }; render() { return ( <>

{ this.setState({ event: e.target.value }) e.preventDefault() }} /> { this.setState({ date: e.target.value }) e.preventDefault() }} /> { this.setState({ organizer: e.target.value }) e.preventDefault() }} />
